features.featureTitle: Remove the heart CTA from the envelope by ensuring there is no heart call-to-action element (heart emoji/icon, heart button, or CTA copy) inside the selected envelope content block at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]. Apply changes ONLY to that selected element.

Update the styling/structure of the selected envelope content block at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3] so the envelope looks more like a real envelope (e.g., content positioned like an address area rather than a centered headline, subtle address-line treatment). Apply changes ONLY to that selected element.
